example.description: This example describes the specified bundle task.

example.code:
PS C:\> $filter = New-Object Amazon.EC2.Model.Filter PS C:\> $filter.Name = "state" PS C:\> $filter.Values = @( "complete", "failed" )
PS C:\> Get-EC2BundleTask -Filter $filter
example.description: This example describes the bundle tasks whose state is either 'complete' or 'failed'.
